attributes.additional_details: The country is in a serious crisis after 12 years of Tory rule. It is time for the whole UK electorate to have their votes counted
attributes.background: I want Parliament to call a General Election now so that the whole of the UK gets the opportunity to vote and not be dictated to by +/- 150, 000 Tory members

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
